Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Model.Fronts

Class ResourceFront

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Model.Fronts.Front
SoftEng_2024.Model.Fronts.ResourceFront
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldFront
public class ResourceFront extends Front
Represents the front side of a resource card in the game.

Extends the Front class, providing basic functionality for resource cards: - frontAngles: An array of Angles representing the angles or resources on the front side. - points: The points awarded when the card with this front side is placed. - covered: An array indicating which angles/resources are covered.

See Also:

      getPoints in class Front
      Returns:

    • getScoreTypes

      public ScoreTypes getScoreTypes()
      Retrieves the score types associated with the resource card front. Since this is a resource card, it returns null as it doesn't have a specific score type.
      Specified by:
      getScoreTypes in class Front
      Returns:
      Always returns null for resource cards.

    • getRequiredResources

      public Angles[] getRequiredResources()
      Retrieves the required resources associated with the resource card front. Since this is a resource card, it returns an empty array as it doesn't have required resources.
      Specified by:
      getRequiredResources in class Front
      Returns:
      An empty array of Angles for resource cards.

    • getFrontAngles

      public Angles[] getFrontAngles()
      Retrieves the front angles associated with the resource card front.
      Overrides:
      getFrontAngles in class Front
      Returns:
      The array of Angles representing the front angles/resources.

    • checkRequiredResources

      public boolean checkRequiredResources(int[] boardResources, Card played)
      Checks if the required resources for the resource card are available on the player's board. Since this is a resource card, it always returns true.
      Specified by:
      checkRequiredResources in class Front
      Parameters:
      boardResources - An array of integers representing available resources on the board.
      played - The card being played.
      Returns:
      Always returns true for resource cards.

    • updateScoredPoints

      public int updateScoredPoints(int[] anglesCounter, int coveredAngles)
      Updates the scored points based on the placement of the resource card. Since this is a resource card, it simply returns the points associated with the card.
      Specified by:
      updateScoredPoints in class Front
      Parameters:
      anglesCounter - An array containing counts of angles/resources.
      coveredAngles - The number of covered angles/resources.
      Returns:
      The points awarded when the resource card is placed.
